abstract: Mattel reports that third-quarter net income rose nearly 6 percent, to $300.8 million, and revenue rose 9 percent, to nearly $2 billion.
snippet: The toymaker Mattel said on Friday that strong sales worldwide of its Barbie dolls and “Cars 2” toys helped third-quarter net income rise.
lead_paragraph: The toymaker Mattel said on Friday that strong sales worldwide of its Barbie dolls and “Cars 2” toys helped third-quarter net income rise.

headline.main: Strong Toy Sales Help Lift Mattel Profit 6%
headline.print_headline: Strong Toy Sales Help Lift Mattel Profit 6%
